S04bsu037_u:1_0: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye potalakaparvate āryāvalokiteśvarāyatane divyamaṇiratnaśrīindranīlamaye
S04bsu037_u:1_1: puṣpasaṃstṛte devasiṃhāsane bhagavān sārdhaṃ mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena pañcamātrairbhikṣuśataiḥ
S04bsu037_u:1_4: śatajātibhirvā pratibaddhaiḥ sarvaiḥ aṣṭaphalaprāptairdaśabhūmisthitaiḥ tad yathā
S04bsu037_u:1_6: candanena amṛtaketunā evaṃpramukhaiḥ saptaśataiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ sārdham upāsakopāsikābhiḥ
S04bsu037_u:1_7: sarvaiśca vyākṛtaiḥ samādhiprāptaiḥ nānālokadhātubhiḥ sannipatitaiḥ pañcasahasraiḥ
S04bsu037_u:2_1: vyākaraṇaprāptābhiravaivartikābhiḥ anaupamyayā vimalaprabhayā ca prabhāvatyā bhīmaśriyā
S04bsu037_u:4_0: atha taiḥ sarvaistathāgataṃ siṃhāsananiṣaṇṇaṃ jñātvā svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaistathāgataṃ
S04bsu037_u:5: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān sarvasattvamahākaruṇājñānasthitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:6: tena samādhidhāraṇabalena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātavaḥ ābhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan /
S04bsu037_u:8: ye ca sattvā jātyandhāḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma /
S04bsu037_u:15: sattvānāṃ yaḥ khalu dhanavastubhogavihīna āsīt sa dhanavastubhogasampanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:17: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau ye kecit sattvā anuśāsanadharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:18: ye sattvāḥ [Dutt_50] devabhūtāste sarvadevasukhaṃ saṃprahāya buddhānusmṛtiṃ kṛtvā dharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:19: ye sattvā manuṣyabhūtāste ca manuṣyasukhaṃ parityajya dharmaśravaṇakāmāya yena bhagavāṃstena upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:20: ye sattvā nāgayakṣarākṣasapretapiśācabhūtāste buddhānusmṛtiṃ prāpya sarvasattveṣu maitracittā bhūtvā kāyacittasukhaṃ labdhvā dharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:21: ye sattvā yamaloke andhatamisrāyāṃ jātāste 'pi buddhānubhāvena ekakṣaṇaṃ smṛtiṃ labdhvā parasparaṃ saṃjānate sma /
S04bsu037_u:25: tena khalu samayena mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍ vikāraṃ prakampate unnamati avanamati sma /
S04bsu037_u:26: atha tasyāṃ parṣadi maṃjuśrīkumārabhūtaḥ sanniṣaṇṇaḥ san bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāryāvalokiteśvarametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:27: kulaputra mahābodhisattvaparṣadi avabhāsitāyāṃ mahāparṣadaḥ pūrvanimittaṃ parisphuṭam /
S04bsu037_u:30: kulaputra anekānāṃ ca bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sarvāśāparipūri mahājñānapratilambho bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:31: tat kulaputra sattvānāṃ kāruṇyamutpādya hitāya sukhāya yāvadanuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpanāya tathāgataṃ paripṛccha /
S04bsu037_u:32_0: santi kulaputra sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye bhaviṣyanti pāpakāriṇo daridrāḥ
S04bsu037_u:32_1: kṛśā durvarṇaśarīrā jarāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ parīttabhogā aparibhāvitakāyā alpāyuṣkā
S04bsu037_u:33_0: teṣāmarthāya kulaputra tathāgatamadhyeṣaya dharmadeśanāyai tat te kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati
S04bsu037_u:33_1: dīrgharātraṃ sattvānā[marthāya] hitāya sukhāya sarvāvyādhipraśamanāya sarvapāpanivāraṇāya
S04bsu037_u:37_1: kurvan yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya paṃcamaṇḍalena praṇipatya
S04bsu037_u:38_0: santi bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle bhaviṣyanti jarāvyādhiśokamṛtyu[duḥkha]kālamṛtyuparipīḍitāḥ
S04bsu037_u:38_1: kṛśā durvarṇā alpāyuṣkāḥ parīttabhogā aparibhāvitakāyāste parasparāṇi mātsaryadauḥśīlyacittatayā
S04bsu037_u:40: tat teṣāmahaṃ bhagavan arthāya hitāya sarvāśāparipūrarṇārthaṃ yāvat tathāgatajñānāharaṇārthaṃ buddhakṣetropapattaye sarvapāpanivāraṇārthaṃ tathāgatamadhyeṣyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:41: bhāṣasva bhagavan bhāṣasva sugato nāsti tathāgatasya tajjñānaṃ yadaviditam adṛṣṭam aśrutam avijñātameva /
S04bsu037_u:42_1: samāgatā dharmasāṃkathyaṃ śrotukāmāḥ pūrvabuddhaparyupāsitāḥ saprajñā jātāḥ te nirāśībhūtā prakramiṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:43: atha te sarve yathā samāgatāḥ parṣat paṃcamaṇḍalena praṇipatya ekakaṇṭhena evamāhuḥ /
S04bsu037_u:44: sādhu bhagavan bhāṣasva bhagavan bhāṣasva sugataḥ /
S04bsu037_u:45: [Dutt_52] atha bhagavān dvirapi trirapi adhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā daśadiśamavalokya valgumaṇojñasvareṇāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:46: asti kulaputra sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānsattvāvalokanabuddhakṣetrasandarśanavyūho nāma samādhiḥ yo mayā pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya śrutaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:48: tat sahaśravaṇādeva tasya samādhernāmadheyasya navatīnāṃ sattvakoṭīnāṃ tathāgatajñānapratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:51: tat smarāmyahaṃ kulaputra divyena tathāgatajñānena triṃśatyā tathāgatasahasrairayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣitaḥ sattvānāmarthāya /
S04bsu037_u:53: ayaṃ ca yathā samāgatā sarvabodhisattvānāṃ parṣad bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā parṣad[ete sarve]śrutvā mānanāṃ pūjanāṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu037_u:56_0: sarvakāmaṃ gatāḥ kṛtasarvāśāḥ samṛdhyante vigatavyādhayaḥ saṃvṛttā paripakvakuśalamūlāḥ
S04bsu037_u:56_3: prajñāvantaḥ buddhe dhama saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā dhṛtimantaḥ āyurvarṇatejobalarathāmavantaḥ
S04bsu037_u:57: na ca kadācit priyaviprayogaṃ na priyavyasanaṃ saṃvṛttam /
S04bsu037_u:58: evaṃ kulaputra bahuguṇasasanvāgatāste kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:59_1: samalaṃkṛtya namo buddhāyeti kṛtvā namaskariṣyanti sādhukāraṃ dāsyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S04bsu037_u:59_2: vācayiṣyanti vācāpayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti paramagauravaṃ cittamutpādya
S04bsu037_u:59_3: tasya dharmabhāṇakasyāntike te dṛṣṭa eva dharme sarvasaguṇasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti
S04bsu037_u:59_4: abhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyā vigatavyādhayo dīrghāyuṣkāḥ sthirabuddhayaḥ smṛtimantaḥ
S04bsu037_u:59_5: dhṛtimantaḥ sarvarājānāṃ sarvarājñīnāṃ rājaputrāmātyānāṃ sarvaśatrūṇāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ
S04bsu037_u:64: sarvāvaraṇaṃ cāsya kṣayaṃ cāsyanti paṃcānantaryaprabhṛtayaḥ kṛtvā /
S04bsu037_u:67: na īrṣyāluko na vikṣepacittaṃ kālaṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:68: yāvaccyutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadyate vyākṛtāste mayā kulaputra saṃmukhavyākaraṇena /
S04bsu037_u:71: bodhau ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti satkṛtya likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti nāmadheyaṃ ca
S04bsu037_u:73: bodhisattva iti sa manasi kṛtvā satkartavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:74_0: yenāsya pūvakarmavipākenāsya rūpavaikalyaṃ bhogavaikalyaṃ buddhivaikalyaṃ paribhāṣyaṃ
S04bsu037_u:74_1: ca priyaviprayogaṃ ca rājyakṣobhaṃ ca te asya samādheranubhāvena śravaṇena kecicchīrṣarogeṇa
S04bsu037_u:74_2: kecidbhaktacchedena kecit kucelābhidhāraṇena kecit kāyacittapīḍena kecit duḥkhasaṃsparśaśayyākalpanena
S04bsu037_u:74_3: kecit paribhāṣyeṇa sarvaṃ tat karmāvaraṇaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu037_u:75: tena cavaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā saṃsāre saṃsaradbhiḥ pāpamakuśalaṃ sattveṣu nānāprakāramupacitaṃ taṃ pratideśayāmi āviṣkaromi na praticchādayāmi /
S04bsu037_u:77_0: yeca tasya kulaputrasya kuluduhiturvā chedabhogaphalaṃ saṃvartanīyaṃ [Dutt_55] karmāvaraṇaṃ
S04bsu037_u:77_1: bhaviṣyati buddhe vā dharme vā saṃghe vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhe vā mātāpitṛbhirvā
S04bsu037_u:79_0: ye ca tasya kulaputrasya ca kuladuhiturvā duḥkhanārakavedanīyaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
S04bsu037_u:79_2: īrṣyāmānakrodhavaśena yamalokapretatiryagyonisaṃvartanīyaṃ tat sarvaṃ parikṣayaṃ yāsyati /
S04bsu037_u:83_3: yāvadvyākaraṇapratilaṃbhakarāṇi dhāraṇīmantrapadāni yāni śrutvā dhāritvā vācitvā
S04bsu037_u:84: sa te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraśca sarvānetān guṇān pratilabhante /
S04bsu037_u:85: atha tasmin samaye iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāramakaṃpata /
S04bsu037_u:86: sā ca yathā samāgatā parṣat tathāgataṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyaduṣyayugaiḥ saṃcchādya sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu037_u:87: sādhu sādhu bhagavan katamāni tāni mantrapadāni /
S04bsu037_u:91: sarvaśāparipūraṇe dyutindhare narake ca pūjite tathāgatajñānadade tathāgatādhiṣṭhāne ca /
S04bsu037_u:97_0: imāni tāni kulaputrāho mantrapadāni triṃśatyā tathāgatasahasrairbhāṣitāni adhiṣṭhitāni
S04bsu037_u:97_1: mayāpyetarhi bhāṣitā[ni] sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye
S04bsu037_u:98_0: yaḥ kaścit parṣa evaṃ jānīyuḥ kathaṃ nu vayaṃ sarvānetān tathāgatabhāṣitān guṇān
S04bsu037_u:98_1: pratilabheya tena kalyamevotthāya sarvasattvānāṃ dayācittena karūṇācittena maitracittena
S04bsu037_u:98_2: īrṣyāmānamrakṣakrodhaparivarjitena ekāgracittena buddhasyodāratarāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā daśadiśaṃ
S04bsu037_u:98_3: sarvatathāgatānāṃ namaskṛtvā yathākāmaṃ guṇān manasikṛtya aṣṭaśataṃ japya puṣpamekaikaṃ tathāgate deyam /
S04bsu037_u:106: [Dutt_57] asyāṃ khalu punardhāraṇyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ ṣaṣṭīnāṃ ca prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilaṃbho 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:107: sarve ca sarva[karmā] varaṇavinirmuktāḥ sarvābhiprāyaparipūrṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:110: atha khalu vajrapāṇirbodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ vyavalokya bhagavantametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:111: asti bhagavan abhayatejaṃ nāma dhāraṇī bodhisattvānāṃ pratijñā yā mayā abhayavyūharājasya tathāgatasyāntikādudgṛhītā /
S04bsu037_u:113_0: tataḥ punaḥ bhagavan nābhijānābhi yasya svapne 'pi sā dhāraṇī karṇapuṭe nipatitāntargatā
S04bsu037_u:113_1: tasya syāccharīre daurbalyaṃ vā kleśo vā vyādhirvā jvaro vā kāyaśūlaṃ vā cittapīḍā
S04bsu037_u:113_2: vā akālamṛtyurvā udakaṃ vā śastraṃ vā viṣaṃ vā garaṃ vā ḍākinī vā bhūto vā yakṣo
S04bsu037_u:113_3: vā śatravo vā manuṣyā vāmanuṣyā vā viheṭhaṃ vā kartuṃ hiṃsāṃ vā vidhātuṃ vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
S04bsu037_u:115: teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikānāmarthāya śrotṝṇāṃ mānayitṝṇāṃ pūjayitṝṇāṃ dhārayitṝṇāṃ vācayitṝṇāṃ sarvāśāparipūrakarāṇi /
S04bsu037_u:118: tadyathā om vajradhara vajradhara vajrakāya vajrabala vajrateja /
S04bsu037_u:132: asyāṃ dhāraṇyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī unmajjanimajjanaṃ karotu /
S04bsu037_u:133: sarve ca yakṣarākṣasāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ sarve ca devā yāvad manuṣyāmanuṣyā vismayamāpannāḥ sādhukāraṃ pradadati /
S04bsu037_u:134: sādhu sādhu mahāsattvāḥ paramasiddhāni imāni dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣitāni /
S04bsu037_u:136_0: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvabhūmimabhiprārthayate dhanadhānyabhogaiśvaryaṃ
S04bsu037_u:136_1: rājyaṃ vidyādharatvam āyurbalavīryadīrghāyuṣkatvaṃ tena śuklāṣṭamyāṃ śvetacandanamayo
S04bsu037_u:138: sadhātukaṃ vajra[dharaṃ] samāśvāsakaṃ vidyādharaṃ dhūpadahyamānaṃ śucinā ahorātroṣitena kāryam /
S04bsu037_u:139: tato 'ṣṭamyāṃ pūrvasecaṃ [Dutt_59] kṛtvā śuce satathāgatasthāne mahatā dhūpapuṣpagandhadīpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā triskṛtvā aṣṭaśatiko jāpo dātavyaḥ tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:140_0: sarvatathāgatānāṃ namaskṛtya catvāri pūrṇakumbhā[ni]sthāpya raktacandanamayaṃ maṇḍalaṃ
S04bsu037_u:140_1: kṛtvā śvetavastrāprāvṛtena ekāgramānasena caturdiśe ca rasagandhamadyapāyasavaliṃ
S04bsu037_u:141: yāvat pañcadaśī tato mahānirghoṣo bhaviṣyati pṛthivīkampaśca raśmayo niścariṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:149: sādhu sādhu vajrapāṇe anatikramaṇīyā iyaṃ mudrā /
S04bsu037_u:150: nātra kāṃkṣā na vimatirna vicikitsā kartavyā sadevakena lokena /
S04bsu037_u:156: sarvatathāgatānāmadhiṣṭhānaṃ [Dutt_60] sarvabodhisattvānām adhiṣṭhitaśca sarvasamādhiṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni pratilabhate /
S04bsu037_u:158: devānāṃ nāgānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ pretānāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ yāmalaukikānām amī sattvāḥ puṇyopagāḥ sukṛtakarā buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu prasādaṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu037_u:160: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pāpadṛṣṭigatānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sarvapāpebhyo nivārayati /
S04bsu037_u:163: te ca sattvā buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu prasādaṃ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṣupapadyante /
S04bsu037_u:171: duṣkaraṃ ca bhagavan arhattvaṃ prāgevānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S04bsu037_u:173_3: puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśanīyaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāṃ
S04bsu037_u:173_4: pūjanasatkaraṇapuṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ tasyāyaṃ pūrvimakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamāmapi kalāṃ nopaiti /
S04bsu037_u:174: yaśca mayā kulaputra dharmo bhāṣitaḥ paryāvāptaḥ taṃ sarvaṃ satkare gurukare mānaye pūjaye satkṛtya likhaye likhāpaye /
S04bsu037_u:175: yaścāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ likhe vācaye pūjaye saṃprakāśaye bahutaram itaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ parigrahīṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:179_0: te ca sattvāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ khādyapeyahāsyanāṭyābhiratā aśubhe śubhasaṃjñinaḥ kāmakrodhavyāpādabahulā
S04bsu037_u:179_1: asukhe sukhasaṃjñinaḥ prahārākrośatarjanatāḍanābhiratā na jñāsyanti na manasi kariṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:180: te tataḥ pāpakarmanidānājñānā akalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā jarāvyādhiśokamṛtyuparipīḍitā maraṇakāle paritarpyante /
S04bsu037_u:181: śmaśānasadṛśamaṃcāvalaṃvyamānaṃ parasparaṃ paśyanti na ca kuśalacittamutpādayiṣyanti nābhedyaprasādam /
S04bsu037_u:183_1: mānayituṃ pūjayitum udgrahītuṃ na likhituṃ na likhāpayituṃ na śraddhadhātuṃ na ca
S04bsu037_u:183_2: tān dharmabhāṇakān satkartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum [api na śakyate /
S04bsu037_u:184: ] tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kulaputra tatra viṣaye bhaviṣyati yatrāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:185: atha sā yathā samāgatā parṣat sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu037_u:187: vayamapi bhagavan dharmabhāṇakaṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikaṃ tathāgatakṛtyena satkariṣyāmaḥ gurūkariṣyāmaḥ mānayiṣyāmaḥ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ cāsyopasaṃhariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:188: ayaṃ ca dharmaparyāyaṃ vaistarikīkariṣyāmaḥ rakṣiṣyāmaḥ yenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaściraśtitiko bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:189: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yathā samāgatāṃ parṣadamavalokyaivamāhuḥ /
S04bsu037_u:192: kāyacittanirapekṣairbhūtvā sarvopaplavanaparibhavanaparibhāṣaṇatarjanaprahārākrośalabhyamānam [api] imaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrāvayitavyo likhitavyo vācayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:193: taṃ ca dharmabhāṇakaṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena copasthātavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:194: sa ca viṣayaḥ sa ca dvīpaḥ sa ca nagaro rakṣitavyaḥ sarvabhayopadravopasargopāyāsebhyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:195: tasya ca kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā satatasamitaṃ samanvāhartavyam /
S04bsu037_u:197: śṛṇuta kulaputra apramattā mā paścakāle parittāpyu bheṣyatha /
S04bsu037_u:198: buddhasya utpādyu kadāci labhyate kalpānakoṭībhi śataiḥ sahasraiḥ //
S04bsu037_u:199: guṇāśca śṛṇvatvabhiśraddadheta na durlabhā teṣu samādhi bheṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:200: kalpānakoṭīn yatha gaṅgavālikā yo dānu dadyā dvipadottameṣu //
S04bsu037_u:201: dhanaṃ cā dhānyaṃ tatha vastrabhūṣaṇaṃ gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca /
S04bsu037_u:203: na tasya puṇyasya pramāṇu vidyate tā cāpramāṇaṃ sugatena deśitam //
S04bsu037_u:204: raṇyaṃ ca seveta sadāpramatto dhyānaṃ ca dhyāyetu sadānyacittaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:205: dānaṃ ca dadyā priyaputradhītarā hastau ca pādau ca parityajeta //
S04bsu037_u:207: yathaiva sūtrasya dhareti kaści ayaṃ tato puṇyaviśeṣyu prāpnuyā /
S04bsu037_u:208: arthasya dātā varasūtrametat sarvasyāpāyā sadā varjitāsya //
S04bsu037_u:209: dhanasya dhānyasya ca dāyako hyayaṃ guṇāśca sarve 'pi na tasya durlabhāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:210: āyurbalaṃ vīryu na tasya durlabhaṃ dhāreti sūtraṃ ya imaṃ viśuddham //
S04bsu037_u:211: drakṣyanti buddhamamitābhu nāyakaṃ mayāpi sa vyākṛtu buddhabodhau /
S04bsu037_u:212: na tasya pāpaṃ pi kadāci vidyate sukhāvatīṃ drakṣyati lokadhātum //
S04bsu037_u:213: yaṃ cāpi tasya sada karmu bheṣyati sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati cittanīḍe /
S04bsu037_u:214: kāyasya śūle tatha śīrṣatāpe na tasya jātu vinipātu bheṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:215: sāṃdṛṣṭikāṃścāpi guṇāṃ sa lapsyate sarvaṃ yathā cintitu prārthitaṃ ca //
S04bsu037_u:216: tasmābhi tebhi sada bhikṣubhikṣuṇī upāsakopāsika rājabhiḥ sadā /
S04bsu037_u:217: gurugauravaṃ kṛtvā ca dharmabhāṇake yathā narendrasya tathāgatasya //
S04bsu037_u:219: idaṃ ca sūtraṃ sada dhāritavyaṃ satkāru nityaṃ ca kartavyadhārake /
S04bsu037_u:220: gandhaiśca mālyaiśca vilepanaiśca satkāru kṛtvā ca likhāpayeta //
S04bsu037_u:222: narakeṣu tiryakṣu paribhramāṇāḥ ṣaṇḍhāśca paṇḍāśca jugupsanīyāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:223: jātyandhabhūtāḥ kuṇapāśca gandhinaḥ saṃjāsyate nīcakuleṣu strīṣu //
S04bsu037_u:224: īrṣyālukasya sada pāpacāriṇaḥ krodhābhibhūtasya ca matsariṣya /
S04bsu037_u:225: buddheṣu dharmeṣu karitva gauravam imeṣu jātīṣūpapadyate 'sau /
S04bsu037_u:226: tatraiva duḥkhāni ca vedamānā mā paścakāle paritāpyu bheṣyatha //
S04bsu037_u:227: tasmābhi tehi sada pūjitasya yaścaiva dhāreta prakāśayeta /
S04bsu037_u:228: yaścaiva paribhāṣaṇu tasya kurvate jugupsanāṃ tāḍanabandhanañca //
S04bsu037_u:230: mamaiva tena paribhāṣaṇā kṛtā mamaiva satkāru karitva dhārake /
S04bsu037_u:231: tasmācca tairhi sada dharmabhāṇake yaścaiva dhāreta likheta vācaye /
S04bsu037_u:232: satkāru taiśca sad anityu kuryā srigdhāśca vāco madhurā bhaṇeta //
S04bsu037_u:236: anusmarāmyahaṃ bhagavan asti vyavalokanaprātihāryā nāma dhāraṇī yā mayā pūrvaṃ jñānaketuprabhākarasya tathāgatasyāntikādudgṛhītā śrutā[ca] /
S04bsu037_u:237: yāṃ śrutvā matvā udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā satkaritvā likhitvā likhāpayitvā avaivartikabhūmiṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu037_u:245: sādhu sādhu kulaputra pravartaya adhiṣṭhitaṃ tathāgatena /
S04bsu037_u:246: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ sarvatathāgatebhyo namaskṛtya imāni mantrapadāni bhāṣate sma /
S04bsu037_u:255: vyavalokaya māṃ smara smara yat tvayā pūrvaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtam /
S04bsu037_u:261: yanmama kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ dāridrayaṃ vā tanme kṣapaya /
S04bsu037_u:272: sādhu sādhu subhāṣitamidaṃ mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇārthaṃ sarvāśāparipūrakaram /
S04bsu037_u:277: yathā tathāgatena parikirtitaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ mama kāṃkṣa[te] /
S04bsu037_u:278_1: buddhakṣetropapattiṃ tena śuklapakṣe śucinā susnātagātreṇa bhūtvā āryāṣṭāṃgopavāsopavasitairaṣṭamyāmārabhya
S04bsu037_u:278_3: sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ sa ca dharmabhāṇakaḥ śuciḥ susnātagātraḥ śvetavastraprāvṛto nānāpuṣpamālyagandhairabhyarcya
S04bsu037_u:278_5: dayācittena karuṇācittena tathāgatagurugauravaṃ cittamupasthāpya tena dine dine likhatā
S04bsu037_u:279: aṣṭamyāmārabhya yāvat pañcadaśīṃ dine dine saiva pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:280: tato 'nenaiva vidhinā likhitamātreṇa pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi sarvapāpāni cāsya kṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu037_u:285: tena likhāpayitvā pūrvamukhīṃ sadhātukāṃ tathāgatapratimāmavalokiteśvarapratimāṃ ca sadhātukāṃ sthāpya sadhātukeai caitāyatane puṣpadhūpagandhairdīpaiśca udāratarā pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:287: śuciśuklabhojinā āryāṣṭāṃgopavāsopavasitena suhṛtsahāyakena mānakrodhamātsaryaparivarjitena dine dine udāratarāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā trisandhyaṃ jāpaḥ aṣṭaśatiko dātavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:290: daśadiśamabhinamaskṛtya paścimena bhīmāyā devyāḥ pūrveṇānopamāyāḥ ūrdhvena śaṃkhinyā balirnānārasapāyasadadhyodanaścaturdiśaṃ kṣeptavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:295_0: [ane]naiva vidhinā pūrvasecaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ pūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ catvāri pūrṇakuṃbhā[ni]sthāpya
S04bsu037_u:295_2: taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ samalaṃkṛtya dadhimadhupāyasadadhyodanamanyāni ca yathālambhena
S04bsu037_u:295_3: baliṃ caturdiśe dattvā nivedya sumanaḥpuṣpāṣṭakaśatairekaikaṃ japya caturdiśe kṣeptavyam /
S04bsu037_u:296: pūrvavat tryaṣṭaśataiḥ sumanojātipuṣpairekaikaṃ japya āryāvalokiteśvarapratimā āhartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:306: mahādṛḍhabalavīryasaṃpannastejavāṃstīkṣṇendriyo buddhimān sarvasattvadayācitto dharmajño yāvaccyavanakāle buddhaṃ bhagavantamāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ paśyati /
S04bsu037_u:308: dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ yathepsiteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu mahācakravartikuleṣu yatrānusmṛtiṃ karoti tatropapadyate /
S04bsu037_u:311: imāni te dhāraṇīmantrapadāni na vinā tathāgatādhiṣṭhānasyāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śakyaṃ śrotuṃ na dhārayituṃ na pūjayituṃ na likhituṃ na likhāyituṃ na śraddadhātum /
S04bsu037_u:312: sace darśanaṃ bhave na śravaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:313: sace śravaṇaṃ tadvikṣiptacittaḥ śroṣyati na śraddhāsyati na satkariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:314: sace satkare kleśavyāpādacittaḥ[satkariṣyati] sace likhe likhāpayeta vyākṣiptacittaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:329: evaṃ smarāmyahaṃ bhagavanmayā bhagavataḥ kauśāmbyāṃ ghoṣilasyārāme viharataḥ purataḥ pratijñā samudāhṛtā sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
S04bsu037_u:331: tanme bhagavānanujānātu bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya sarvāśāparipūraṇārthāya bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ ca /
S04bsu037_u:357_0: yaḥ kaścidbhagavadguṇārthī dhanadhānyārthī sarvasattvavaśīkaraṇārthī bhave mahaiśvaryaṃ
S04bsu037_u:357_1: rājatvaṃ vidyādharatvamabhikāṃkṣa[te]mamāpi saṃmukhadarśanaṃ tena aṣṭamyāṃ śuklapakṣe
S04bsu037_u:357_2: nave paṭake acchinnadaśe keśāpagate śucinā citrakareṇa āryāṣṭāṅgopavāsopavasitena
S04bsu037_u:358_0: madhye tathāgatapratimā dharmaṃ deśayamānā dakṣiṇenāryavajrakrodho vajraṃ bhrāmayamānaḥ
S04bsu037_u:358_2: anopamā śarakāṇḍagaurī sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā śvetavastrā padmahastā samāśvāsayaṃtī /
S04bsu037_u:359_0: tataḥ śucinā vidyādhareṇa āryāṣṭāṅgopavasitena śucau sadhātuke tathāgatasthāne kṣīrayāvakāhāreṇa
S04bsu037_u:359_2: pūjāṃ kṛtvā triskṛtvā tryaṣṭaśatiko jāpo dātavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:360: ekaikaṃ sumanaḥpuṣpaṃ jāpya tryaṣṭaśataiḥ sā pratimā āhartavyā tathāgatasya vajrapāṇeśca pūrvataraṃ puṣpadhūpagandhaṃ dātavyam /
S04bsu037_u:362: pūrṇapañcadaśyāmanenaiva vidhinā baliḥ anyā[ni] ca yathālābhena dhūpakarpūrakundurukacandanamrakṣaṃ dātavyam /
S04bsu037_u:365: yathepsitaṃ varaṃ dāsyāmi samādhilābhamākāśagamanamantardhānaṃ rājatvaṃ balacakravartitvaṃ vidyādharatvaṃ nidhivādaṃ dhātuvādaṃ paracittajñānaṃ dīrghāyuṣkatvam /
S04bsu037_u:369_0: yadi cāhaṃ bhagavan pañcānantaryaṃ kariṣyāmi tribhiḥ sādhanairna samanvāherayaṃ mā
S04bsu037_u:369_1: cāhaṃ bhagavannanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ sace buddhe aprasādalabdho
S04bsu037_u:369_2: bhave yaśca vimatiprāpto yaścaṃ pāpamakuśalaṃ kṛtvā na viratimanugṛṇhāti kleśopakleśacittastasyāhaṃ
S04bsu037_u:372: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ bhagini yattvayā sarvasattvānāmarthāya pāpasamācāreṣu [Dutt_74] sattveṣu imā evaṃrūpā mantrapadā bhāṣitāḥ pratijñā kṛtā /
S04bsu037_u:373: śakṣyasi tvamanayā evaṃrūpayā mahākaruṇayā sarvasattvānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prati[ṣṭhā]payitum /
S04bsu037_u:375: atha śaṃkhini mahādevī bhagavantaṃ nānāpuṣpairnānāgandhairabhyarcya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādaryonipatya bhagavantametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:377: teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikānāṃ sarvāśāparipūrakarāṇi mantrapadāni dāsyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:390: aṣṭaśatajaptena yathālābhena baliṃ dattvā caturdiśe dhūpaṃ kundurukaṃ tathāgatasyodāratarapūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:395: atha bhagavān sā ca yathāsamāgatā parṣa sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu037_u:402: atha khalu bhīmā mahādevī suvarṇapuṣpairbhagavantamabhyarcya bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya bhagavantametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:403_0: ahamapi bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikānāṃ teṣāṃ ca lekhakānāṃ teṣāṃ
S04bsu037_u:403_1: ca dhārakāṇāṃ vācakānāṃ pūjakānāmarthāya sarvāśāparipūrakarāṇi hiraṇyamaṇimuktā bhogaiśvaryarājatvadīrghāyuṣkarāṇi
S04bsu037_u:404_0: yaḥ kaści rājā vā rājñī vā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā dhārayiṣyanti satkariṣyanti
S04bsu037_u:404_1: likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti tathāgatagurugauraveṇa pratiprattyā yathopadiṣṭāḥ pratipatsyante
S04bsu037_u:404_2: tasyāhaṃ bhagavan rakṣiṣyāmi paripālanaṃ kariṣyāmi yathocitaṃ varaṃ dāsyāmi bhogaiśvaryairavaikalyaṃ
S04bsu037_u:406: [Dutt_76] tasya ca viṣayasya nagarasya paripālanaṃ kariṣyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:416: devi mahādevi satyavacanadevi bhīme satyavacanapratiṣṭhite guhyanivāsini svāhā /
S04bsu037_u:417: imāni tāni bhagavan mantrapadāni tathāgatādhiṣṭhitāni tathāgatānujñātāni mayā bhāṣitāni sattvānāmarthāya /
S04bsu037_u:418: yaṃ yameva kāmaṃ manasikṛtvā japiṣyate tathāgatasya purataḥ puṣpadhūpagandhadīpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā pāyasarasabaliṃ caturdiśe dattvā taṃ tameva aṣṭaśatajāpena sarvāśāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:419_0: yaḥ kaści māṃ svarūpeṇābhikāṃkṣī bhave tena acchinnadaśe keśāpagate aśleṣairaṅgairnavabhājanasthairaṣṭasyām
S04bsu037_u:419_2: śvetavastrā madhye tathāgatapratimā dha[rma deśa]yamānā dakṣiṇenāryāvalokiteśvaraḥ
S04bsu037_u:419_3: sāṃkathyaṃ kurvan vāmapārśve bhīmā mahādevī [Dutt_77] kuṇḍiganetṛkaparigṛhītā samāśvāsayantī /
S04bsu037_u:420_0: tato 'ṣṭamyāṃ pūrvasecaṃ kṛtvā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanaiḥ sadhātuke caityasthāne
S04bsu037_u:420_1: balipāyasadadhyodanaṃ caturdiśe yāvat pūrṇapañcadarśīṃ śūcinā vidyādhareṇa udāratarāṃ
S04bsu037_u:420_2: puṣpadhūpagandhadīpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtva baliṃ dattvā nānārasairanyāni ca yathālābhena
S04bsu037_u:420_3: śuklabaliṃ dattvā sarvasattvānāṃ maitracittena dayācittena bhūtvā jātīpuṣpā[ṇāma]ṣṭabhiḥ
S04bsu037_u:421_0: ekaikaṃ japya tatrāhaṃ svarūpeṇopatiṣṭhiṣyāmi yathepsitaṃ varaṃ dāsyāmi rājyaiśvaryam
S04bsu037_u:421_1: ākāśagamanaṃ nidhivādaṃ dhātuvādaṃ vidyādharatvam anyāni ca yathepsitāni karmāṇi
S04bsu037_u:422_0: yadi cāhaṃ bhagavan pañcānantaryaṃ kariṣyāmi na sarvāśāṃ paripūrayeyaṃ mā cāhaṃ bhagavannanuttarāṃ
S04bsu037_u:424: sādhu sādhu bhagini sādhu khalu punastvaṃ bhagini yattvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya sukhāya pratipannā asyaiva ca dharmaparyāyasya cirasthityarthaṃ [Dutt_78] pratipannā /
S04bsu037_u:425: tena hi bhagini nityameva imāḥ pratijñāstvayā nityameva samanvāhartavyāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:426: atheyaṃ mahāpṛthivī tasmin samaye pracacāla divyañca kusumavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat /
S04bsu037_u:432_0: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarbhagavantametadavocat kiṃ punarbhagavan
S04bsu037_u:434: tena hi tvāmevāryāvalokiteśvara pariprakṣyāmi yathe te kṣamaṃ tathā vyākuru /
S04bsu037_u:436: bhagavāneva vyākurutāṃ nāsti tathāgatasya adṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā avijñātaṃ vā /
S04bsu037_u:438: yaśca kulaputra asya dharmaparyāyasya likhanalikhāpanavācanapūjanasaṃprakāśanapaṭhanasvādhyayanāt puṇyamanuprāpsyati sa upamenāpi na śakyaṃ varṇayitum /
S04bsu037_u:441: dānaṃ dattvā te sattvā aparimuktā eva bhavanti jarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadauramanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:442: varṣatasahasraṃ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ kriḍāpayitvā aparimuktā eva te sattvā bhavanti narakatiryagyoniyamalokapretaviṣayeṣu punarapi duḥkhānyanubhavanti /
S04bsu037_u:443_0: asya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇaṃ sattvebhyaḥ kṛtvā pūjanaṃ saṃprakāśanaṃ[ca]kṛtvā arthaṃ
S04bsu037_u:443_1: cāsyāvaśrutya [Dutt_79] pratipattyā pratipadya parimuktā eva bhavanti jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhya
S04bsu037_u:444: tasmāt tathāgata ayaṃ puṇyaskandha upamenāpi pramāṇaṃ na kurvanti /
S04bsu037_u:445_0: yaśca kulaputra asya ca dharmaparyāyasyoddiśya sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ ca hiraṇyasya
S04bsu037_u:445_1: ekapuṣpaṃ vā ekaphalaṃ vā ekapatākāṃ vā vādyaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā vastraṃ vā āsanaṃ vā
S04bsu037_u:445_2: ābharaṇaṃ vā parityaje likhe likhāpaye dhāraye vācaye pūjaye satkare parebhyaśca
S04bsu037_u:445_3: viastareṇa saṃprakāśaye taṃ ca dharmabhāṇakaṃ vācaye pūjaye yaśca tiṣṭhate tathāgate
S04bsu037_u:445_4: saṃmukhapūjayā saparṣa pūjaye mānaye sarvasukhopadhānena varṣaśatasahasramupatiṣṭhe
S04bsu037_u:445_6: saptaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kāraye śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā tathāgata[muddiśya]tāṃśca divyapūjayā
S04bsu037_u:445_7: pūjaye varṣaśatasahasram ayaṃ ca tato bahutarapuṇyasaṃskāraṃ syā /
S04bsu037_u:447: tathāgatasaṃmukhapūjāṃ na tveva sattvebhyo dānaṃ dattvā pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaḥ krīḍāpayitvā /
S04bsu037_u:448: tasmāttarhi taiśca kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā rājarājaputramahāmātrāmātyairvā satatasmitamayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:450_0: teṣāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrāvayati kathayati arthaṃ cāsyopasaṃharati
S04bsu037_u:450_1: taḥ satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotavya udagrahītavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyo manasi kartavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:453_0: yo 'smābhiḥ śrutam apathagāmināṃ pathamupadarśayati anarthe arthasaṃjñinām anitye
S04bsu037_u:455: mahākṛtyena tathāgatakṛtyena imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ prakāśitam /
S04bsu037_u:457_0: ayaṃ ca kulaputra dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyati
S04bsu037_u:458_0: sa ce uttarapūrvapaścimāyāṃ pracare tat parakarmābhiyuktāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti na
S04bsu037_u:458_1: śroṣyanti śraddhāsyanti na pattīṣyanti na pūjayiṣyanti hīnavīryanaṣṭasmṛtayo nānāvyākṣepakuṭambadāsadāsībhogaiśvaryahāsyalāsyanāṭyanṛtyagīterṣyāmātsaryasmṛtayo
